Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Establishes an ADHD suicide prevention task force
Summary: Establishes an ADHD suicide prevention task force to examine, evaluate and determine how to improve mental health and prevent suicide among New York residents aged 3 through 18 who are impacted by attention deficit hyperactivity disorder; provides for the number of members, manner of appointment and the topics to be reviewed.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a task force to create an approach to address and prevent suicide in the ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder) youth population; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
